info.description: REST API for the HopSpot bench management app
info.title: HopSpot API

get.description: Get a paginated list of invitation codes
Get a paginated list of users with optional filters

parameters.description: Search term for username or email
parameters.name: search

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns access and refresh tokens
Registers a new user and returns access and refresh tokens

get.description: Get a paginated list of benches with optional filters

parameters.description: Search term for bench name or location
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Filter by presence of trash bin
parameters.name: has_trash_bin

parameters.description: Radius in meters for proximity search
parameters.name: radius

post.description: Create a new bench with the provided details

get.description: Retrieve a single bench by its ID
Retrieves all photos for a specific bench

post.description: Uploads a photo to the specified bench
post.summary: Upload a photo for a bench

get.description: Retrieve the total number of visits for a specific bench
get.summary: Get visit count by bench ID

delete.description: Deletes a photo by its ID

patch.description: Sets a photo as the main photo for its bench

get.description: Retrieves a presigned URL for accessing a photo

parameters.description: Size of the photo (e.g., original, medium, thumbnail)
parameters.name: size

get.description: Retrieve the profile of the currently authenticated user

patch.description: Update the profile of the currently authenticated user

post.description: Change the password of the currently authenticated user

get.description: Get a paginated list of visits for the authenticated user

post.description: Record a new visit to a bench
Generates new access and refresh tokens using a valid refresh token
Updates the FCM token for the authenticated user

get.description: Gibt das aktuelle Wetter für die angegebenen Koordinaten zurück

BearerAuth.description: JWT Token in the format: Bearer {token}
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
